description: An alertMessage trap signifies that an alert was
was generated for a storage device monitored
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SUNSTORAGEAGENT-NOTIFICATION-MIB::alertMessage SUNSTORAGEAGENT-NOTIFICATION-MIB::deviceName s EXAMPLE SUNSTORAGEAGENT-NOTIFICATION-MIB::alertLevel i 0 SUNSTORAGEAGENT-NOTIFICATION-MIB::message s EXAMPLE SUNSTORAGEAGENT-NOTIFICATION-MIB::gridId s EXAMPLE SUNSTORAGEAGENT-NOTIFICATION-MIB::deviceId s EXAMPLE SUNSTORAGEAGENT-NOTIFICATION-MIB::componentName s EXAMPLE SUNSTORAGEAGENT-NOTIFICATION-MIB::componentId s EXAMPLE SUNSTORAGEAGENT-NOTIFICATION-MIB::eventId s EXAMPLE SUNSTORAGEAGENT-NOTIFICATION-MIB::eventName s EXAMPLE

description: The name of the storage device that the alert message
variables.name: SUNSTORAGEAGENT-NOTIFICATION-MIB::deviceName

description: The level of importance of the alert related to failure.
variables.name: SUNSTORAGEAGENT-NOTIFICATION-MIB::alertLevel

description: The alert message for the storage device.
variables.name: SUNSTORAGEAGENT-NOTIFICATION-MIB::message

description: The name of the component with in the device.
variables.name: SUNSTORAGEAGENT-NOTIFICATION-MIB::componentName

description: The identifier of the failed component.
variables.name: SUNSTORAGEAGENT-NOTIFICATION-MIB::componentId

description: Id of the event that caused the notification.
variables.name: SUNSTORAGEAGENT-NOTIFICATION-MIB::eventId

description: The event name corresponding to the gridId
variables.name: SUNSTORAGEAGENT-NOTIFICATION-MIB::eventName
